rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Foyer
rooms.description: The entrance hall is strategically placed at the front to welcome visitors while maintaining a clear separation between public and private spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large open space adjacent to the foyer with ample natural light from North-facing windows, incorporating modern furniture and smart home features. Vastu principles are adhered to by ensuring proper alignment of energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A contemporary kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, ergonomic layout, and sufficient ventilation. Placed in the North-West quadrant to harness positive energies.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features a walk-in closet, an ensuite bathroom, and large windows for ample natural light. Placed in the North-East quadrant to maximize morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest bedroom with integrated storage options, placed adjacently to maintain a private yet accessible environment.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: An immersive home theater space designed for family entertainment with soundproofing and ambient lighting. Strategically located in the Southeast to minimize external noise.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym featuring modern equipment, ample floor space, and ventilation. Placed on the ground level with easy access from the living room while maintaining a clear boundary for privacy.

rooms.name: Open Balcony / Patio
rooms.description: An outdoor space adjoining the living area, offering a private retreat that complies with Vastu by being positioned in a favorable cardinal direction.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: A modern door leading from the entrance hall to the exterior, designed with smart security features and energy-efficient materials.

openings.name: Backdoor / Patio Door
openings.description: A sliding glass door connecting the living room to the open balcony, providing a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.
